statements: SELECT satellite_id, satellite_name, latitude, longitude FROM satellite_positions WHERE satellite_id = 1;
SELECT satellite_name, longitude, latitude, satellite_id FROM satellite_positions WHERE longitude < 0;
SELECT * FROM satellite_positions WHERE latitude >= 30;
SELECT satellite_id, latitude FROM satellite_positions WHERE longitude >= 0 ORDER BY satellite_name DESC;
SELECT satellite_name AS name, longitude AS lon, latitude AS lat FROM satellite_positions;
SELECT * FROM satellite_positions WHERE latitude > 0 AND longitude < 0 ORDER BY satellite_name ASC, latitude DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT satellite_id, longitude FROM satellite_positions WHERE satellite_name LIKE '%A%' OR satellite_name LIKE '%B%' ORDER BY satellite_id ASC
SELECT satellite_name, latitude, longitude FROM satellite_positions WHERE latitude < -50 AND longitude > 100 ORDER BY satellite_name DESC, latitude ASC
SELECT DISTINCT satellite_id, satellite_name FROM satellite_positions WHERE longitude >= 0 ORDER BY satellite_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT satellite_id, satellite_name, latitude, longitude FROM satellite_positions WHERE latitude <> 0 AND longitude IS NOT NULL ORDER BY satellite_id DESC, satellite_name ASC
SELECT * FROM satellites;
SELECT id, name, altitude FROM satellites ORDER BY altitude DESC;
SELECT name, longitude, latitude FROM satellites WHERE altitude > 1000;
SELECT * FROM satellites WHERE longitude < 0;
SELECT name, altitude, longitude, latitude FROM satellites ORDER BY altitude ASC, longitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellites WHERE altitude > 1000 ORDER BY longitude DESC;
SELECT name, altitude FROM satellites WHERE latitude < 0;
SELECT * FROM orbits WHERE orbit_type = 'Polar' AND orbit_angle > 45;
SELECT s.name, o.orbit_type, o.orbit_period FROM satellites s JOIN orbits o ON s.id = o.satellite_id;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM satellites ORDER BY altitude ASC, longitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellites;
SELECT id, name, latitude, longitude FROM satellites WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orbits WHERE orbit_type = 'LEO' ORDER BY altitude DESC;
SELECT id, satellite_id, timestamp, position_x, position_y, position_z FROM positions ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, name, latitude, longitude FROM satellites WHERE latitude > 0 AND longitude < 0;
SELECT * FROM satellites WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM satellites WHERE latitude > 0;
SELECT satellites.name AS satellite_name, orbits.id AS orbit_id, orbits.orbit_type FROM satellites JOIN orbits ON satellites.id = orbits.satellite_id;
SELECT positions.timestamp, positions.position_x, positions.position_y, positions.position_z FROM positions WHERE satellite_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT satellites.name AS satellite_name, orbits.orbit_type, positions.position_x, positions.position_y, positions.position_z FROM satellites JOIN orbits ON satellites.id = orbits.satellite_id JOIN positions ON satellites.id = positions.satellite_id WHERE positions.timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT satellite_name, orbit_type, altitude_km FROM satellites;
SELECT * FROM orbits WHERE period_minutes > 60;
SELECT satellite_name, longitude_deg, latitude_deg FROM satellites JOIN positions ON satellites.satellite_id = positions.satellite_id;
SELECT satellite_name, orbit_name, period_minutes FROM satellites JOIN orbits ON satellites.satellite_id = orbits.orbit_id;
SELECT satellite_name, timestamp FROM satellites JOIN tracking_history ON satellites.satellite_id = tracking_history.satellite_id;
SELECT satellite_name, altitude_km FROM satellites ORDER BY altitude_km DESC;
SELECT * FROM orbits WHERE period_minutes BETWEEN 90 AND 120;
SELECT satellite_name, altitude_km, longitude_deg, latitude_deg FROM satellites JOIN positions ON satellites.satellite_id = positions.satellite_id WHERE longitude_deg < 0;
SELECT * FROM tracking_history WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT satellite_name, orbit_name, period_minutes FROM satellites JOIN orbits ON satellites.satellite_id = orbits.orbit_id ORDER BY period_minutes ASC;
SELECT * FROM satellites ORDER BY satellite_id DESC;
SELECT satellite_name, orbit_radius FROM satellites WHERE orbit_speed > 1000;
SELECT * FROM satellite_positions WHERE latitude BETWEEN -90 AND 90 AND longitude BETWEEN -180 AND 180;
SELECT satellite_id, orbit_type, inclination FROM satellite_orbits ORDER BY inclination ASC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_tracks WHERE track_duration > '1 hour';
SELECT * FROM satellites WHERE orbit_speed > 500
SELECT satellite_name, orbit_radius FROM satellites WHERE satellite_id = 3
SELECT satellite_name, orbit_type FROM satellites JOIN satellite_orbits ON satellites.satellite_id = satellite_orbits.satellite_id
SELECT * FROM satellite_positions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY latitude DESC
SELECT satellite_name, eccentricity FROM satellites JOIN satellite_orbits ON satellites.satellite_id = satellite_orbits.satellite_id WHERE eccentricity > 0.1
